review: Best nerd toy ever! At first I couldn't imagine how it was going to improve our TV watching & once we had it installed- an all of 30 seconds to install- plus into the ubs port on the side of the TV & an electrical outlet. It works with our Amazon Prime account & we are watching programs & movies we love instead of the junk on regular TV. Being handicapped I love being able to watch decent fun programs during the day. I loved it so much we now had 2 so we can leave them plugged into our TV's & bought one for my daughter too!
author: Francine Warren

review: Easy to install and set-up. My Wi-Fi sucks so it does impact the streaming of Netflix, but I like that this is compact and easy to move around or take with you on travels. No more moving around my Blu-ray equipment to stream Netflix. It also makes it convenient to use the Fire TV Stick to stream AmazonPrime movies/shows and SlingTV. The Navigation menu takes some getting used to, but once you do, you are good to go.
